repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:latest

MAINTAINER InnovativeInventor

WORKDIR /usr/src/app

RUN apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends git nginx -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN git clone https://github.com/InnovativeInventor/fu-malaria /usr/src/app
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir gunicorn flask numpy opencv-python

WORKDIR /usr/src/app/flask

EXPOSE 8000
CMD [ "gunicorn", "app:app", "-w", "4", "--bind", ":8000" ]
